Text: Anybody check this show out or what?

I was there!  We weren't allowed in at first b/c it was sold out so my friend and I just hung out behind the corner door and listened it- eventually the owner gave us the green light and we caught the second half- it was one of the best concerts I've been to this year...  Thanks so much for making this track available.

The quality is excellent!  Which is remarkable given the challenges of recording their sound.

Many many thanks.

I hope others pick this up, I'll keep seeding it for while.

Hello Terraplane, 

I'll be very glad if you could send me the original files (the 1.2 Go's one) if you still have it !

Thanks
